html: 11.14.18  7:22 pm   What are the last two chords the singers hit in those empire carpet commercials?

11.14.18  6:53 pm   you did say you prefer releasing songs individually, but would you consider releasing your past songs as a compilation album? thanks

11.14.18  5:44 pm   I am really enjoying Slow Down, especially the bit when there's some bobblin going down on 124th street. Any cool facts about that part?

11.14.18  5:33 pm   would you ever consider doing an original christmas/holiday song?

11.14.18  3:53 pm   What about those 1 hour videos on YouTube that has a person play all 12 notes on a piano in different octaves and say what the notes are so it can be "imprinted" in your brain?

Do you think that is helpful in trying to learn absolute pitch? Or is it useless? Or does it just depends? It might be easier for me to just memorize song keys. What's your opinion on that?
11.14.18  3:39 pm   How many eggs can fit in your house?
11.14.18  3:26 pm   When will you do another history video

11.14.18  3:06 pm   what factors influence how a title of a song of yours is capitalized? i've noticed an increase in capital letters, but there doesn't seem to be a pattern to when you use them. is there a pattern at all?

11.14.18  2:51 pm   you mentioned many times that each time you choose a favourite, another one becomes better. I've never experienced that, pretty weird, lol.  could you guess why that is the case for you?
11.14.18  1:28 pm   what's better than coming back home?

11.14.18  12:59 pm   Have you started focusing more on the intros to your songs?

     The intro to slow down is super punchy and I love it.

11.14.18  9:47 am   Hey Bill. Your last two songs felt really weird... Musically and lyrics wise. My favorite piece from you is "hello sexy pants". It's catchy, it's motivational, with little bits of commentary and humor here and there. It's genius. I'd love to see more songs like it.

11.14.18  9:28 am   do u ever get annoyed at the comments that r like "this guy must be on drugs lol" or just like, commenters in general crediting your creativity to something that isn't entirely you. if that makes sense
11.14.18  8:48 am   how do you make these vehicles? wait no i meant songs

11.14.18  8:24 am   You've been on the internet for a long time, but decided to get into social media quite recently (joined YouTube only in 2013). What led you to expand your content like this, and so long after joining the internet?
11.14.18  8:19 am   r u hyped
11.14.18  8:16 am   hey bill! is there a way to remember/memorise music notes so that when I can play the piano it will be easier? I always find myself staggering whenever its one note than another
11.14.18  8:11 am   do you plan to sell pullovers, too? i'd like to spend some money for your merch but it's already too cold for t-shirts
